item.title: PHOTO: DeSoto woman accused of animal cruelty for seeking DIY amputation instructions for cat
item.description: The cat's leg was “reduced to exposed bone,” according to the sheriff’s office.

item.title: Bradenton man charged with violent second-degree murder of girlfriend in April
item.description: The victim died from traumatic brain injury, facial fractures, and other internal injuries.

item.title: Man arrested after leaving bag full of cocaine at hotel counter, deputies charge
item.description: Hotel employees called deputies after they saw the contents of the bag.

item.title: Appeals court stops order to wind down operations at ‘Alligator Alcatraz’
item.description: A court in Atlanta decided to stay the federal judge’s order pending the outcome of an appeal.

item.title: Caught on camera: Police looking for suspects in car break-ins
item.description: Several suspects were seen pulling on car doors at the Kendall Ridge Apartments.

item.title: Sarasota Sheriff SUV involved in a major crash on Albee Farms Road
item.description: Major multi-vehicle crash involving a Sarasota Sheriff SUV closes Albee Farms Road during p.m. drive.

item.title: DeSoto County woman arrested after asking vet how to amputate her cat’s leg
item.description: Seeing the cat in poor shape, deputies brought it to the hospital and opened an investigation.

item.title: Donna Adelson guilty as charged in murder for hire plot
